verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [ARGM-TMP: finally] [V: pushed] [ARG2: back] [ARG1: on LeBron James] , [ARGM-ADV: stating today on the South Lawn of the White House that neither the Cavaliers nor the Warriors would be invited there if the win the NBA championship] .
